database.name: Vertical
database.statement: CREATE TABLE QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS ( JOB_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, JOB_GROUP @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, DESCRIPTION @varchar(250)@ @nullable@, JOB_CLASS_NAME @varchar(250)@ @notNullable@, IS_DURABLE @integer@ @notNullable@, IS_VOLATILE @integer@ @notNullable@, IS_STATEFUL @integer@ @notNullable@, REQUESTS_RECOVERY @integer@ @notNullable@, JOB_DATA @blob(1)@ @nullable@, PRIMARY KEY (JOB_NAME,JOB_GROUP) )

CREATE TABLE QRTZ_JOB_LISTENERS ( JOB_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, JOB_GROUP @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, JOB_LISTENER @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, PRIMARY KEY (JOB_NAME,JOB_GROUP,JOB_LISTENER) )

CREATE TABLE QRTZ_TRIGGERS ( TRIGGER_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, TRIGGER_GROUP @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, JOB_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, JOB_GROUP @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, IS_VOLATILE @integer@ @notNullable@, DESCRIPTION @varchar(250)@ @nullable@, NEXT_FIRE_TIME @bigint@ @nullable@, PREV_FIRE_TIME @bigint@ @nullable@, PRIORITY @integer@ @nullable@, TRIGGER_STATE @varchar(16)@ @notNullable@, TRIGGER_TYPE @varchar(8)@ @notNullable@, START_TIME @bigint@ @notNullable@, END_TIME @bigint@ @nullable@, CALENDAR_NAME @varchar(200)@ @nullable@, MISFIRE_INSTR @integer@ @nullable@, JOB_DATA @blob(1)@ @nullable@, PRIMARY KEY (TRIGGER_NAME,TRIGGER_GROUP) )

CREATE TABLE QRTZ_SIMPLE_TRIGGERS ( TRIGGER_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, TRIGGER_GROUP @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, REPEAT_COUNT @bigint@ @notNullable@, REPEAT_INTERVAL @bigint@ @notNullable@, TIMES_TRIGGERED @bigint@ @notNullable@, PRIMARY KEY (TRIGGER_NAME,TRIGGER_GROUP) )

CREATE TABLE QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS ( TRIGGER_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, TRIGGER_GROUP @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, CRON_EXPRESSION @varchar(120)@ @notNullable@, TIME_ZONE_ID @varchar(80)@, PRIMARY KEY (TRIGGER_NAME,TRIGGER_GROUP) )
CREATE TABLE QRTZ_BLOB_TRIGGERS ( TRIGGER_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, TRIGGER_GROUP @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, BLOB_DATA @blob(1)@ @nullable@, PRIMARY KEY (TRIGGER_NAME,TRIGGER_GROUP) )

CREATE TABLE QRTZ_TRIGGER_LISTENERS ( TRIGGER_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, TRIGGER_GROUP @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, TRIGGER_LISTENER @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, PRIMARY KEY (TRIGGER_NAME,TRIGGER_GROUP,TRIGGER_LISTENER) )
CREATE TABLE QRTZ_CALENDARS ( CALENDAR_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, CALENDAR @blob(1)@ @notNullable@, PRIMARY KEY (CALENDAR_NAME) )
CREATE TABLE QRTZ_PAUSED_TRIGGER_GRPS ( TRIGGER_GROUP @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, PRIMARY KEY (TRIGGER_GROUP) )

CREATE TABLE QRTZ_FIRED_TRIGGERS ( ENTRY_ID @varchar(95)@ @notNullable@, TRIGGER_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, TRIGGER_GROUP @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, IS_VOLATILE @integer@ @notNullable@, INSTANCE_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, FIRED_TIME @bigint@ @notNullable@, PRIORITY @integer@ @notNullable@, STATE VARCHAR(16) @notNullable@, JOB_NAME @varchar(200)@ @nullable@, JOB_GROUP @varchar(200)@ @nullable@, IS_STATEFUL @integer@ @nullable@, REQUESTS_RECOVERY @integer@ @nullable@, PRIMARY KEY (ENTRY_ID) )
CREATE TABLE QRTZ_SCHEDULER_STATE ( INSTANCE_NAME @varchar(200)@ @notNullable@, LAST_CHECKIN_TIME @bigint@ @notNullable@, CHECKIN_INTERVAL @bigint@ @notNullable@, PRIMARY KEY (INSTANCE_NAME) )
CREATE TABLE QRTZ_LOCKS ( LOCK_NAME @varchar(40)@ @notNullable@, PRIMARY KEY (LOCK_NAME) )
ALTER TABLE QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS ADD CONSTRAINT FK_QRTZ_01 FOREIGN KEY (TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP) REFERENCES QRTZ_TRIGGERS (TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP) @deleteCascade@
ALTER TABLE QRTZ_JOB_LISTENERS ADD CONSTRAINT FK_QRTZ_02 FOREIGN KEY (JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP) REFERENCES QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS(JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP) @deleteCascade@
ALTER TABLE QRTZ_SIMPLE_TRIGGERS ADD CONSTRAINT FK_QRTZ_03 FOREIGN KEY (TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP) REFERENCES QRTZ_TRIGGERS(TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP) @deleteCascade@
ALTER TABLE QRTZ_BLOB_TRIGGERS ADD CONSTRAINT FK_QRTZ_04 FOREIGN KEY (TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP) REFERENCES QRTZ_TRIGGERS(TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP) @deleteCascade@
ALTER TABLE QRTZ_TRIGGER_LISTENERS ADD CONSTRAINT FK_QRTZ_05 FOREIGN KEY (TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP) REFERENCES QRTZ_TRIGGERS(TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP) @deleteCascade@
ALTER TABLE QRTZ_TRIGGERS ADD CONSTRAINT FK_QRTZ_06 FOREIGN KEY (JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP) REFERENCES QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS(JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP) @deleteCascade@
INSERT INTO QRTZ_LOCKS VALUES('TRIGGER_ACCESS')
INSERT INTO QRTZ_LOCKS VALUES('JOB_ACCESS')
INSERT INTO QRTZ_LOCKS VALUES('CALENDAR_ACCESS')
INSERT INTO QRTZ_LOCKS VALUES('STATE_ACCESS')
INSERT INTO QRTZ_LOCKS VALUES('MISFIRE_ACCESS')
